descriptionHTML:
Electron watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Electron Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Electron Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ 24-hour time format
✔ Battery level
✔ Ambient mode
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month
✔ Display seconds

How to use Electron Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Electron watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Electron Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market
comments: its nice! much better than nice if they give other color
Works well with Huawei watch. Thanks to dev team for quick response. Needs more options in terms of back ground color, perhaps fonts, etc for a 5 Star
The background is grey not even dark grey to complement the blue digits ...Don't have any options to change..
